description: Developing Operational Tools to Integrate Energy Considerations into MDG-based National Development Strategies

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local governments and communities have the capacities to adapt to climate change and make inclusive and sustainable environment & energy decisions benefitting in particular under-served populations
subproject.description: To include energy considerations in MDG-based National Development Strategies (NDS) and planning efforts, and as a part of the greater UNDP Integrated Package of Services (IPS) to support MDG attainment.  Also to explore what kind of energy-related actions and resources are needed to support an MDG-based NDS and finally to develop the analytical tools and methodologies to help practictioners incorporate energy strategies into the MDG/PRS framework at the country level.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Developing Operational tools t
